title: Design for Tube Radio with Speaker on Top, for Crosley Radio Corporation
medium: pastel, gouache, pen and black ink, graphite, on green paper
description: Cylindrical green radio featuring speaker baffle at top of cabinet and tuning and volume knobs on side panel.  A Crosley scrift in yellow found below control knobs.
name: Drawing
